total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the positions of the number 8 in the input grid.
Q2: Identify the positions of the number 4 in the input grid.
Q3: Determine the relationship between the positions of the number 8 and the number 4 in the input grid.
Q4: Based on the relationship identified in Q3, determine the transformation rules to apply to the number 8 in the input grid.
Q5: Apply the transformation rules identified in Q4 to the number 8 in the input grid to generate the output grid.
